actorNames.title: Actors names to be exposed for an AI application (AI agent)
actorNames.description: Specify the names of actors that will be exposed to an AI application (AI agent) and communicate with Apify Actors via the MCP protocol

debugActorName.title: Debug actor name
debugActorName.description: Specify the name of the actor that will be used for debugging in normal mode

debugActorInput.title: Debug actor input
debugActorInput.description: Specify the input for the actor that will be used for debugging in normal mode
